落下了很多亏钱机会

olimpio: There's a risk of a black swan event in DeFi.
As per Defillama, if CRV drops below $0.37, there's 300M CRV to liquidate in Aave -most from Curve's founder
The problem? There's not a single Exchange or DeFi protocol where one can sell such a large CRV amount.
Risks explained 🧵

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
RT 𝐓𝐗𝐌𝐂
I find myself repeatedly coming back to this 70-year chart of the disparity between ⚫️real and 🔴nominal US GDP on a 5yr rolling basis.
Nominal GDP is juiced to the moon, but the peak of real GDP growth in dollar terms was all the way back in 2000. Structurally lower highs since…
